languages.text: "Как хочешь. Если тебя убьют из-за собственных жадности и высокомерия, это будет забавно".
"Have it your way. It will be funny if your own greed and arrogance get you killed."
languages.original_text: "Как хочешь. Если тебя убьют из-за собственных жадности и высокомерия, это будет забавно".

traits.locale_text: "Have it your way. It will be funny if your own greed and arrogance get you killed."
"Have it your way. It will be funny if your own greed and arrogance get you killed."
"Have it your way. It will be funny if your own greed and arrogance get you killed."
"Have it your way. It will be funny if your own greed and arrogance get you killed."

languages.text: “那就这样吧。如果你因为贪婪与傲慢送了命，那一定会很有趣。”
languages.original_text: "Have it your way. It will be funny if your own greed and arrogance get you killed."

traits.locale_text: “那就这样吧。如果你因为贪婪与傲慢送了命，那一定会很有趣。”

languages.text: «Como quieras. Si tu avaricia y arrogancia hacen que te maten, será divertido».
languages.original_text: "Have it your way. It will be funny if your own greed and arrogance get you killed."

traits.locale_text: «Como quieras. Si tu avaricia y arrogancia hacen que te maten, será divertido».

languages.text: 「好きにしろ。貴様の貪欲さと傲慢さで死ぬことになったらいい笑い話になる」
languages.original_text: "Have it your way. It will be funny if your own greed and arrogance get you killed."

traits.locale_text: 「好きにしろ。貴様の貪欲さと傲慢さで死ぬことになったらいい笑い話になる」

languages.text: "Wie Ihr wollt. Es wird gewiss ein Spaß, wenn Eure Gier und Arroganz Euren Tod herbeiführen."
languages.original_text: "Have it your way. It will be funny if your own greed and arrogance get you killed."

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr wollt. Es wird gewiss ein Spaß, wenn Eure Gier und Arroganz Euren Tod herbeiführen."

languages.text: « Comme vous voudrez. On rira bien quand votre cupidité et votre arrogance vous mèneront à votre perte. »
languages.original_text: "Have it your way. It will be funny if your own greed and arrogance get you killed."

traits.locale_text: « Comme vous voudrez. On rira bien quand votre cupidité et votre arrogance vous mèneront à votre perte. »

languages.text: "Öyle olsun. Kendi hırsın ve kibrin yüzünden ölürsen iyi gülerim ama."
languages.original_text: "Have it your way. It will be funny if your own greed and arrogance get you killed."

traits.locale_text: "Öyle olsun. Kendi hırsın ve kibrin yüzünden ölürsen iyi gülerim ama."
